name: sqlite-worker
description: A simple, and persistent, SQLite database for Web and Workers

scripts.build: npm run import && npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min
scripts.import: terser node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm-debug.js -m -o esm/sql-wasm.js && sed -i 's/module=undefined;/var module=void 0;/' esm/sql-wasm.js && echo ';export default initSqlJs;' >> esm/sql-wasm.js
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck

author: Andrea Giammarchi
